title: 14 Day ban for this?

replies.body: Next bad word you say you are getting perma banned, remenber that.
Ban escalated quickly. Return with better judgement.
Yep u were toxic BAN DESERVED

It has nothing to do with "how negative" it is. The punishment is based on the number and severity of punishments you've gotten before. This isn't a case of "oh I just stole a pack of gum", it's a case of "oh I kept stealing things after I was told not to".

You were given warnings to not be negative, you continued to do so. Riot gave you a 14 day ban (and now the threat of a permanent ban) to attempt to get you to reform and **not be negative at all** from now on. If you continue to be negative, even in a "minor" way (which isn't actually minor, mind you), you will be removed from the game by means of a permanent suspension.

I dont duo and i have never with you... but nice try.

Right off the bat you call someone autistic and cite their stats as your reasoning for doing so. The rest of the game is just you verbally abusing and harassing your teammates via insults and name-calling as well as threatening to afk just because you don't like Vayne, the same person that you called autistic at the very start of the match. Regardless of how other people are behaving this doesn't give you a free pass to behave poorly as well.

As for why it's a 14-day ban, most likely you have already received at least 35-games worth of chat restrictions and continued to behave poorly despite them. A 14-day ban is the next step on the punishment ladder after a 25-game chat restriction and the previous step before a permanent ban. Because you're at a 14-day ban continued poor behavior will result in a permanent ban regardless of severity. Next time just mute, report and move on instead of responding with negativity of your own.
